de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.datatables

Interface IListController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataTableController<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTableController, AbstractListController, DataTableClubsController, DataTableLeagueGamesController, DataTableOtherEventsController, DataTablePeopleController, DataTableRefereesController, DataTableTournamentsController, DataTableTraineesController

    public interface IListController<T extends TitledIDTypeModel>

    Interface for the list scene controller.
